name: Connected TV Grid - Wide
description:
Wide grid for TV (Connected TV) Devices


Feel free to use this grid for your next project and I hope it helps you out. This grid complies with the current technical limitations among various devices and platforms.


To learn more about designing for CTV Devices, check out my Udemy course "How to design for Connected TV (CTV) Devices"


https://www.udemy.com/course/how-to-design-for-connected-tv-ctv-devices/
